original_title: Gold Star Tribute: A National Salute to America's Heroes
overview: A one-hour television show executive produced by Peter Berg and Mickey Markoff, Gold Star Tribute: A National Salute to America's Heroes, aired nationally on the USA Network on Sunday, May 26, 2019 with powerful footage from the Hyundai Air and Sea Show intertwined with heroic stories, bringing the message of remembrance and sacrifice to a national audience.
title: Gold Star Tribute: A National Salute to America's Heroes
